庉字的基本解释

庉
dùn
楼墙。
房舍。
室中藏。

庉
tún
〔庉庉〕火燃得很旺的样子。
居。

庉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dùn］
［《廣韻》徒損切，上混，定。］
(1)楼墙。
(2)象声词。参见“庉庉”。
[②]［tún］
［《廣韻》徒渾切，平魂，定。］
火炽盛貌。

庉字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庉； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页343第23
【唐韻】徒損切【集韻】杜本切，?豚上聲。【說文】樓牆也。【玉篇】屯聚之處。【集韻】室中藏也。　又【廣韻】【韻會】徒渾切【正韻】徒孫切，?音豚。【集韻】居也。　又【爾雅·釋天】風與火爲庉。【註】庉庉，熾盛之貌。　又【集韻】徒困切，豚去聲。【博雅】舍也。

庉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
庉字的起名意思

暂无。

庉
Basic explanation of words
庉
dùn
Floor wall.
Premises.
Hidden in the room.
庉
tún
[庉庉] The fire is burning.
Home.
庉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dùn］
["Guangyun" is only cut, mixed, fixed. ]
(1) Floor wall.
(2) Onomatopoeia. See "庉庉".
[②]［tún］
["Guangyun" is full of excitement, calm soul, set. ]
The fire is flaming.
庉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　庉; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: Page 343 and 23
[Tang Yun] Lost and cut [Ji Yun] Du Benqie, the sound of the dolphin. [Said the text] The floor wall is also. [Jade articles] Where to gather together. [Ji Yun] The room is also in the possession.　[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Club] Tu Hunqie [Zheng Yun] Tu Sunqie,? Yin Dolphin. [Jiyun] Juye.　[Erya·Shitian] Wind and fire are the same. [Note] Yu Yu, flaming appearance.　[Ji Yun] It’s just sleepy and cut, and the pig is going to sound. [Bo Ya] She also.
